wikipedia_page.main: Denyse Alexander (born 28 June 1931) is a British stage, film and television actress. She was married to the film and television director Jack Gold from 1957 until his death in August 2015.

response: Gold married actress Denyse Alexander (née Macpherson) in 1957, with whom he shared a birthday - she was born in 1932. The couple had three children: Jamie, Nicholas and Kathryn.

link_mentions.page: List of Fawlty Towers cast members
response: * Denyse Alexander as Kitty in "The Anniversary"
